About Me

... and my new Astro site!

I am working through Astro's introductory tutorial. It's the frontend framework I chose for my new blog.

This site will update as I complete more of the tutorial, so keep checking back and see how my journey is going!

Here are a few facts about me:

  • I live in Canada and I work as a Support Engineer.
  • Two of my hobbies are: Coding and Personal Finance

My skills are:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript

  • Selenium & Appium test automation

My goal is to finish in 3 days.
